turns.utterance: I have always wanted a pig as a pet. Vietnamese Pot-bellied pigs are so cute! What do you think?
turns.response: I had one named Hamsley a few years ago, they're so cute with their potbelly and short snout and legs!

turns.utterance: Aww how cute! Some would say with their pronounced sway back and a large sagging belly they are ugly, but I think look like baby rhinos.
turns.response: That's a good comparison! When they're pregnant their bellies get so big they drag the ground!

turns.utterance: Wow I can only imagine a pregnant sow and her belly! I bet that is a sight to see!
turns.response: Hamsley's mother was adorable! I always wanted to breed pigs but I never had the space.

turns.utterance: Wow so cutey pattotie! One of the characters on a show I watched called Moonshiners has a pet pig named Cupcake. Lol!
turns.response: Awe! What a great name for a pig! I can't wait for National Pig Day so I can see shows about pigs.
